CutSceneText.Text: Tursin Orcs are attacking at the front...
You're back! How did it go?
I managed to defeat the Captain...
He said that Shandu is up to something... And that it's already too late.
Bah! The Orcs are history. They attacked us and now they've been annihilated.
An unknown poison is being made in the Duaguru village...
The Orcs' weapons were infused with poison.
That's the only thing the Orcs have going for them...
I'm grateful for your assistance. Let's raise a toast!
